Name: Earl Grey Fizz
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
Review: Looks like a glass of champagne but has a well-judged little extra something.
History: Created in 2002 by Henry Besant at Lonsdale House, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Earl Grey Fizz contains 92 calories
